import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import requestApi from './../../helpers/api' // import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' export const HotPage = (props) => { const {keyword} = props; const[drinkData, setDrinkData] = useState(); useEffect(()=>{ requestApi( `drink`, 'GET', []).then( (response) => { setDrinkData(response.data); }).catch(err => { console.log(err); }) },[]) // console.log(setDrinkData) const renderProduct =() =>{ return drinkData.map((item, index) =>
{

{item.name}

{item.price}
+
}
) } return (
